branchCategory.name: MGP-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder, Stroke Options
branchCategory.description: <p>The MGPM/L-XC8 is an adjustable extend stroke type where the MGPM/L-XC9 allows for stroke adjustment on the retract stroke. The MGPM/L-XB13 is a compact body actuator integrated with internal guide shafts with the ability to operate smoothly at low speeds (5 to 50mm/s).</p>
